album.title: The Best of Chet Baker Sings

track.name: Look for the Silver Lining
comments: COOL SMOOTH CHET BAKER  R I P
Why didn't I know about this before? It's soo beautiful to have Chat and all others here, where it is thousands of miles away from home, from my CDs and everything. It is great, just great.
This is great stuff I love it.goes back to early 50's.
Chet Baker Sings he also Swings. Not the best of singers but I can always enjoy hearing this track.
snaps you back to remember the real jazz self within all of us.
I agree with Willygone. Love his trumpet playing but not too hot on his voice. BUt man, he was a great player.
Amazing how eloquent he is without uttering a word - that horn says it all!
I first heard this on TCM....Chet's a master.
di fronte al più jazzycool, mi scappello..e..genufletto per tutto il love che ha dato al globo terraqueo...
